about.title: About Us
about.description: At Dotty Dog Walking Services, we believe every dog deserves a happy, enriching walk. Whether it's solo strolls or social pack adventures, we offer flexible, professional pet care you can trust — right here in Milton Keynes and the surrounding area.

items.title: Solo Dog Walks
items.description: Individual attention for dogs that prefer their own space.

items.title: Social Dog Walks
items.description: Group walks with carefully matched companions.

items.title: Pet Sitting & Let Outs
items.description: Drop-ins, let outs, stay-and-play sessions — tailored to your needs.

items.title: Fully Insured & DBS Checked
items.description: Peace of mind with verified credentials.

items.title: Pet First Aid Trained
items.description: Your dog's safety is our top priority.

items.title: Daily Updates
items.description: Receive photos and routes after every walk.

quotes.name: Karen Barrington
quotes.quote: Maddie loves her walks with Julie — she’s always happier on those days. The photos and videos I get while at work are brilliant!

quotes.name: Natasha C Lock
quotes.quote: Orla gets so excited when she hears Julie’s name. I love seeing her maps and pics. You’re amazing!

quotes.name: Alexandra Mason
quotes.quote: Julie has been brilliant with my highly strung pooch! Great service and beautiful walk updates.

quotes.name: Nikki Samme
quotes.quote: Faye adores Julie — those walks are the highlight of her day. Reliable and patient, even with water-loving collies!

items.question: Which areas do you cover?
items.answer: We serve Milton Keynes and the surrounding outskirts.

items.question: Are you insured and licensed?
items.answer: Yes, fully insured, DBS checked, Pet First Aid trained, and Parks Trust licensed.

items.question: How do I book?
items.answer: Just email or call us to set up an intro visit!

contact.title: Contact Julie
contact.description: Want to arrange a meet & greet? Have questions about your pup’s needs? I’d love to hear from you!
